messages.subject: slings: was bedtimes rituals
messages.msgSnippet: When my last baby was born, I was really looking forward to getting a sling. I actually already had one ready and waiting for her. The only thing I had
messages.messageBody:
When my last baby was born, I was really looking forward to getting a sling.
I actually already had one ready and waiting for her. The only thing I had
available to me for the other 3 children was those back pack type things and
me and all 3 kids hated them.

So Alyssa was born and we started working on the sling and she never ever
liked it for more than 10 minutes. I was so disappointed and tried so many
times but she hated it. I was so looking forward to that thing and
unfortunately she wasn't!!

Mary B
